projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Gemini Chat
projects.bodyText:
- A modern chat application powered by Google's Gemini AI model for intelligent conversations and assistance.
 - Features real-time chat interface with natural language processing capabilities.
 - Built with Next.js/React.js frontend and Node.js backend.
 - Implements WebSocket for real-time communication.
 - Secure integration with Google's Gemini AI API.

projects.title: SmartFleet - Fleet Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A comprehensive fleet management system for organizations to manage vehicle fleets efficiently.
 - Features include real-time tracking, maintenance scheduling, and driver management.
 - Built with a modern tech stack: React.js/TypeScript frontend and Node.js/Express backend.
 - Includes fuel consumption analytics and maintenance history tracking.
 - Complete with reporting dashboard and JWT authentication.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: RouterControl Bot
projects.bodyText:
- A WhatsApp bot built with Venom-bot and Rasa to control and configure ZTE-F670LV9.0 routers.
 - Reset ZTE-F670LV9.0 routers with a simple WhatsApp command (reset v9).
 - Configure ZTE-F670LV9.0 routers through WhatsApp.
 - Natural language understanding powered by Rasa.
 - Automated browser interaction using Selenium.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
